function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of close proximity leading to contagious disease spread in indoor environments","Impact":"Potential for rapid spreading of contagious diseases among individuals in close proximity","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict social distancing measures, use of ventilation systems, and regular sanitation protocols","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air purifiers, and real-time occupancy monitoring systems","People":"Individuals in indoor environments, such as students in exam halls or workers in facilities","Owner":"Health authorities, facility managers, and event organizers"},{"Description":"Risk of inefficient space planning leading to close proximity and increased risk of disease spread","Impact":"Potential for overcrowding and inadequate distancing, increasing the risk of contagious disease spread","Mitigation":"Utilization of space planning techniques to optimize seating arrangements, implementation of occupancy limits, and use of dynamic space models for adaptive planning","Technologies":"Space planning software, occupancy monitoring systems, and dynamic seating allocation algorithms","People":"Students, workers, and event attendees in indoor spaces","Owner":"Educational institutions, facility managers, and event organizers"}]}
